SELECT G.id, G.title, G.genre, G.description, G.release_date releaseDate, G.price, G.developer, G.publisher, G.rating, G.sales FROM game G
INNER JOIN genre ON G.genre = genre.id
INNER JOIN developer ON G.developer = developer.id
INNER JOIN publisher ON G.publisher = publisher.id
WHERE id < #{startPoint} ORDER BY G.id LIMIT 50
